nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.render

Class Notice_Impl

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.render.Notice_Impl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notice

    public class Notice_Impl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Notice
    Displays a notice atop the board. Once created, its details cannot be changed.
